image:image.image:title: EmmaPartOfMyLacePng-1200

image:image.image:title: 7ae84b3d7d3f6be2842bc1b447d6c135
image:image.image:caption:
'Part of my lace is gone... and I do not know how I am to contrive'
Emma Woodhouse, Harriet Smith and Mr Elton.
Pen & ink and watercolour on 140lb/300gsm Arches hot pressed, 287 x 202mm.
Illustration to Jane Austen's Emma published by the Folio Society, 2007. This illustration is the only one I'm most happy with from this book. It was on display for a short period at the British Library in the Folio Society Gallery there, as part of the 'A Houseful of Books' exhibition, celebrating 40 years of the Folio Society.
